snippet.title: Trial by Fire: Turnabout Déjà Vu [FT] Oh, Banana-
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

Round 2 in the Shattered Glass series, it seems we're skipping over AA1 and onto AA2, but with a twist? An intriguing twist at least... The amnesia shenanigans of AA2-1 but with deja vu and the implications therein...

With some... ahem, guests. Another interesting setup for a series! (Which may or may not have ever been made-)
-----------------------------------------
Shattered Glass: Turnabout Reversal, by TheDoctor!

Taking place almost a year after the final case in Shattered Glass, Trial by Fire: Turnabout Déjà Vu displays Miles Edgeworth take what may be the strangest case in his career so far. A case where, for once, he seems to be not one, not two, but five steps ahead of everyone else.

Find it on Court Records here! https://forums.court-records.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=32570&p=1470667&hilit=trial+by+fire#p1470667
